h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 2
content: This technically counts as one of the Blood of the Iron Bull's you get from the blue glowing enemies, as you get the Wandering Wight Spirit here. But, it is worth mentioning on its own.

This technically counts as one of the Blood of the Iron Bull's you get from the blue glowing enemies, as you get the Wandering Wight Spirit here. But, it is worth mentioning on its own.
